name: Tartarus (itch) (awkcarange)
description:
This is a prototype of a puzzle game that came to mind with our monthly challenge "Discovery". You are an artificial life form that has been sent to the rehabilitation center Tartarus for a choice you made regarding human life. Each level of Tartarus is a massive puzzle, and at the end of each level is a message regarding humans that will become very important at the end of the game....

Is how the full game would go, in this level(The only level) it's just a portion of the tutorial and immediately after the tutorial the puzzle difficulty increases. It's a short design to see if moving room pieces would make a feasible game puzzle game where the entire level has switches that are connected together.

Goodluck!
